attributes.action: Toughen the law and make police have more power to deal with problamatic gangs of youths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is designed to get these chavs, yobs and thugs off our streets!
They are getting away with murder 'literally'
and us as a united britain need to come together and put a stop to this!
Please sign this petition and hopefully something can be done to make britain safer!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
